document_data.name: Staeradder
document_data.Powers: In high doses, staeradder was instantly deadly. In lower doses, it could be used to build an immunity if taken for years, but caused nausea and weakness.
document_data.History: While invading the sanctum of [[Vangerdahast]], the then-retired Royal Mage of Cormyr in the {{yearlinkName|1373}}, [[Harnrim Starangh]] used darts coated in staeradder as one of his weapons. He had already developed a resistance to this venom.
